channel.title: Application Types :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: What types of application can you build? Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Description: Explains at a high level the different types of applications developers can build as Okta defines them. (covering web apps (OIDC, SAML, SWA), API Service Apps, Lifecycle apps (SCIM and Workflow Connectors)) Expand “Create your own integration in Okta” to be more of a thought-leading piece about making any type of app public or private and the pros and cons of that decision.
